title: Can the UK turbo charge “tragic, utopian” EV policy-
subtitle: (Montel) Henry Ford kickstarted the passenger car revolution with his Model T in 1908, famously telling customers they could have “any colour as long as it’s black”. Fast forward a hundred-odd years and Jaguar is offering its experimental, all-electric Type 00 in anything as long as it’s “London blue” or “Miami pink”.
